title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 203.6 - Savings banks trust company
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 203.6 - Savings banks trust company

State Regulations

The Banking Board hereby grants permission for present and
future directors and officers of Savings Banks Trust Company to serve at the
same time directors, officers or employees of M.S.B. Fund, Inc. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
203.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
